content: There is a Pandemic Response Hackathon on March 27-29th. Our goal is to bring #publichealth professionals alongside the #HealthIT community’s talent to contribute to the world’s response to #COVID19 and future pandemics. #hackCOVID19 @_TogetherHealth @ONC_HealthIT

Are you referring to the Datavant hackathon?
https://datavant.com/pandemic-response-hackathon/
Yes, sorry, I did not realize the link was not copied.

Applied for the Datavant hackathon this afternoon.

We just published online a reference app that can query FHIR compliant EHRs for COVID19 related LOINC and SNOMED codes:
http://covid19-on-fhir.meteorapp.com/

Source code here:
https://github.com/symptomatic/covid19-on-fhir
